00026 using namespace std;
00027 using namespace affymetrix_calvin_io;
00028 using namespace affymetrix_grid_control;
00029 using namespace affymetrix_calvin_utilities;

00031 #define TEST_FILE_NAME "./test.new.grc"
00032 
00033 CPPUNIT_TEST_SUITE_REGISTRATION( GridControlFileWriterTest );

00043 void GridControlFileWriterTest::testCreation()
00044 {
00045         GridControlFileWriter *writer = new GridControlFileWriter;
00046         CPPUNIT_ASSERT ( writer != NULL );
00047         delete writer;
00048 }
00049 
00050 void GridControlFileWriterTest::WriteTest()
00051 {
00052         GridControlData data;
00053         FeatureCoordinate coord;
00054         GridControlFileReader reader;
00055         GridControlData dataRead;
00056         GridControlFileWriter writer;
00057 
00058         data.SetRows(5);
00059         data.SetColumns(5);
00060         data.ResizeB1(3);
00061         data.ResizeB2(2);
00062         data.ResizeNS(1);
00063 
00064         coord.x = 0;
00065         coord.y = 1;
00066         data.SetB1(0, coord);
00067         coord.x = 2;
00068         coord.y = 3;
00069         data.SetB1(1, coord);
00070         coord.x = 4;
00071         coord.y = 5;
00072         data.SetB1(2, coord);
00073 
00074         coord.x = 10;
00075         coord.y = 11;
00076         data.SetB2(0, coord);
00077         coord.x = 12;
00078         coord.y = 13;
00079         data.SetB2(1, coord);
00080 
00081         coord.x = 10;
00082         coord.y = 20;
00083         data.SetNS(0, coord);
00084 
00085         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(writer.Write(TEST_FILE_NAME, data) == true);
00086 
00087 
00088 
00089         reader.Read(TEST_FILE_NAME, dataRead);
00090 
00091         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(dataRead.GetRows() == data.GetRows());
00092         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(dataRead.GetColumns() == data.GetColumns());
00093         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(dataRead.GetNumB1Probes() == data.GetNumB1Probes());
00094         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(dataRead.GetNumB2Probes() == data.GetNumB2Probes());
00095         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(dataRead.GetNumNSProbes() == data.GetNumNSProbes());
00096 
00097         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(dataRead.GetB1(0).x == data.GetB1(0).x);
00098         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(dataRead.GetB1(0).y == data.GetB1(0).y);
00099         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(dataRead.GetB1(1).x == data.GetB1(1).x);
00100         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(dataRead.GetB1(1).y == data.GetB1(1).y);
00101         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(dataRead.GetB1(2).x == data.GetB1(2).x);
00102         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(dataRead.GetB1(2).y == data.GetB1(2).y);
00103 
00104         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(dataRead.GetB2(0).x == data.GetB2(0).x);
00105         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(dataRead.GetB2(0).y == data.GetB2(0).y);
00106         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(dataRead.GetB2(1).x == data.GetB2(1).x);
00107         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(dataRead.GetB2(1).y == data.GetB2(1).y);
00108 
00109         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(dataRead.GetNS(0).x == data.GetNS(0).x);
00110         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(dataRead.GetNS(0).y == data.GetNS(0).y);
00111 
00112 }
